reviews.review: The freeman shows his excellence in all things.

This game is way better than half life 1, it is recommended you play the first one (And the dlcs) first. The game story, the graphics, check points, difficulty (on normal), everything is so much more finialized and better made. The firs tone is good too, but this one takes it up to 11. Im hyped to play Hl 2 EP 1! This is a must buy!

Half Life 2  yani daha ne diyim :D m√ºkemmel tabiiki

Probably one of the best shooters i have ever played. Of course amazing graphics for a game from 2004 (I think?) 
Good gun play, good lore, good AI as in when i am in cover and focused on one enemy, the other goes up to my right or left flank and tries to kill me from there, nice maps and the NPC's feel alive kinda, as in reacurring (spelling) NPC's, good guns as well.

Garry's mod which i have was a mod for this game before it became a game of it's own, which just shows you how moddable the game was (was as in i am having trouble now but seeing some videos of modding the game it looked easy).

The game is honestly creepy, as in the lore and that humanity just failed in 7 hours to protect their world from an otherwordly power.

 I like it and would reccomend to others, if you do buy the game (or receive it as a gift) i hope you have fun!

(Spelling very bad as i am not a native english speaker so if you want to help please do so i don't make the same mistakes again)

it's visually pleasing, and it's pretty fun, but after playing the game fully, I still have no idea who [spoiler]Dr Green[/spoiler] is, but the game makes me feel like I should know. Why in Xen's name did this "Steve from tech support" looking mf [spoiler]sick the Combine on my squishy tooshie after I booped into his office[/spoiler]? That's the one event that drives the whole game, and I'm lost on it completely. Anyway, I'm glad this one doesn't have the more intimidating / difficult enemies, like the Alien Grunt, Giganta, or the tentacle enemy, I'm still messed up by those things.

really good action/story game. this game is really good. there is some puzzles not a ton but most of them are pretty simple to do. and half life 2 adds more stuff such as being able to use a car and boat. and diff weapons but sadly they removed the diff firings from some guns such as the pistol and it has pretty good graphics from the time it was made. i think. but in all if you like action and story together with puzzles give half life 2 a try this isnt a bad game at all. its a 9/10 for me at least. but most people will say its a 10/10 since it really is.

Overall, it was okay. I really liked the gravity gun. Especially when it's super charged at the end, it was fun to just toss dudes. Ravenholm was definitely my favorite level. Would I play it again? Eh, maybe? Personally, I prefer the first one.

Half-Life 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the groundbreaking game of the year, Half-Life. The graphics and immersive gameplay continue in this installment and don't disappoint. If you love Half-Life, then you'll love this, too. I think it's one of the best game franchises out there.

One thing, I don't know why
It doesn't even matter how hard you try
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To explain in due time (all I know)

Time is a valuable thing
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
Watch it count down to the end of the day
The clock ticks life away, it's so unreal (it's so unreal)

You didn't look out below
Watch the time go right out the window
Trying to hold on, to didn't even know
I wasted it all just to watch you go (watch you go)

I kept everything inside
And even though I tried, it all fell apart
What it meant to me will eventually
Be a memory of a time when

I tried so hard and got so far
But in the end, it doesn't even matter
I had to fall to lose it all

Not that you knew me back then
But it all comes back to me (in the end)
